summary: FUEL LINE RUBBING AGAINST A SHARP EDGE ON FIREWALL OF 2000 FORD EXPEDITION 4WD,5.4 ENGINE, CAUSED GAS LEAK WHICH WAS LEAKING DIRECTLY ON THE EXHAUST AND CATALYTIC CONVERTER. IF THIS HAD HAPPENED ON TRIP WHICH I HAD PLANNED IN THE NEXT TWO DAYS MY FAMILY COULD HAVE BEEN SERIOUSLY HURT OR WORSE.*AK
